lyrics.text:
Blessed Jesus, at thy word we are gathered all to hear thee; let our hearts and souls be stirred
now to seek and love and fear thee, by thy teachings sweet and holy, drawn from earth to love thee solely.

All our knowledge, sense, and sight lie in deepest darkness shrouded, till thy spirit breaks our night
with the beams of truth unclouded. Thou alone to God canst win us; thou must work all good within us.
